definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish

sentences.english: He's an old hand at fixing cars.
sentences.chinese: 他是補綴汽車的熟手在行。

sentences.english: 'I hate' she altered with an end.
'The strap needs mending, 'said Mrs. Sterling later.
sentences.chinese: “這提包帶必要補綴，”斯特林夫人過後說道。

sentences.english: He's walking to work because hellos bike is being repaired.
sentences.chinese: 他此刻走着上班，由於他的腳踏車正在補綴。

sentences.english: My old coat needs to be patched up.
The third improvment boundary patching is a new algorithm proposed by one ofthe authors of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 邊界補綴法是本文作者之一最近提出的一種新算法。

sentences.english: There is something wrong with my computer. Could you help me mend it?
sentences.chinese: 我的計算機壞了。你能幫忙我補綴一下嗎？

sentences.english: Jim went up the ladder to mend the roof.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆從梯子爬上去補綴屋頂。
